title: A peek into the exotic vacations of the rich and famous this summer
text:
24 shares 31
View
comments
From lounging on a paradise beach with cocktails in hand, to globe-trotting across the world in their private jets, the rich and famous have been celebrating the holiday season in style.
Enviable summer posts across social media include the Jenners and Kardashians enjoying the finer things in life onboard a yacht in St. Barts, while Heidi Klum and Mel B have been pictured happily skipping out of a private plane.
Actress Blake Lively, singer Britney Spears and model Bar Refaeli have all updated their Instagram accounts for their combined 11million-strong fans, showcasing the privileged escapades of the lucky few.
And while model Bar Refaeli has been showing off her enviable figure on a beach at Club Med Finolhu Villas in the Maldives, Britney opted for a family affair, posing as a mermaid with her two children.
The singer is not the only one to have spent the summer season keeping the kids entertained, as the Beckhams enjoyed a family trip to Disneyland.
Provoking envy this bank holiday, here is how the stars have been spending their summer.
Kicking off the holiday season, Miley Cyrus rocked some patriotic shorts and bikini top as she posed next to an inflatable Uncle Sam with musician Wayne Coyne in a stars and stripes coat and hat on Independence Day
Legs for miles: Beyonce displays more than a little leg while being driven in an auto rickshaw during a recent tropical getaway
'Mermaid life': Britney shared this playful family photo of her dressed with a mermaid tail next to her two sons, Jayden and Sean
'Baewatch': Khloe Kardashian and half-sister Kendall Jenner flaunted their fabulous figures in an Instagram post from their St. Barts holiday
Living the high life: Heidi Klum and Mel B stroll hand in hand from what appears to be a private jet
Summer days: Blake Lively uploaded this bikini shot to her four million followers on Instagram

Best daddy ever: While on a visit to Disneyland with his family, David Beckham posed for a picture with Disney characters Elsa and Anna from Frozen
Liked by over 604,000 Instagram users, Beckham also uploaded this adorable shot of Harper riding a bike with stabilisers
Hard life: The model Kendall Jenner posted this ocean-facing picture on her social media account, which has 35.6million followers
'Anaconda': Kylie Jenner shared a picture of her wearing a snake-skin bikini and converse on her Instagram
Heart throb and actor Zac Efron and girlfriend take a bike ride in the sun during their summer
Victoria Secret model Allesandra Ambrosio uploaded this picture with her kids in Paris captioned: 'à bientôt #Paris #summer2015 #goodtimes #férias'
'Take me back': Vanessa Hudgens shared this picture of her time in the Serengeti, Tanzania for a friend's wedding
Pippa Middleton was seen paddle boarding with brother James whilst on a family holiday in St. Barts
Bar Refaeli couldn't resist showing off her beach break in the Maldives on Instagram
Gigi Hadid shared a snap of her and Joe Jonas at Taylor's celebrity-filled party for Independence Day
'Life is better in a bikini': Still on vacation, model Alessandra Ambrosio posted a shot from Mykonos
Girls will be girls: Enjoying some fun in the sun without her co-star beau Spencer Matthews, reality star Lauren Hutton looked incredible as she posed in a series of boat snaps with friends
Pitch Perfect star Anna Kendrick posed next to a rainbow while on holiday in Hawaii
Actress Reese Witherspoon took a woodland shot as a nod back to her role in the movie Wild, which saw her character tackle the Pacific Crest Trail. She was joined in the Instagram photo by Cheryl Strayed who wrote the book based on her own experiences of the trail
Here she comes: Mariah Carey was seen aboard boyfriend James Packer's sprawling yacht
Actress Michelle Rodriguez has recently been to Sardinia for some well-deserved downtime on an idyllic beach
Redcoat: Ed Sheeran teasingly showed up at Taylor's home for July 4th wearing a red military jacket like the ones worn by British soldiers who fought the colonists during the revolutionary war
'Pepperony': Gwyneth Paltrow uploaded this candid shot of Iron Man co-star Robert Downey Jr saying 'how I love thee'
Road trip: Vanessa Hudgens also visited the stunning Monument Valley on the Arizona-Utah border
Simon Cowell shared this cute snap of son Eric eating a slice of watermelon while on holiday
Jessica Alba decided to explore nature, being pictured swimming in a breathtaking Mexican cenote, which is a natural underground reservoir of water
Rumer has it: Rumer Willis shared a snap from Las Vegas showing off her tattoos and the cast on her right foot as she rocked a tiny bikini
On the beach: Jenna Dewan Tatum shared a photo of herself on the beach with husband Channing Tatum and daughter Everly during their family vacation
